title: Best Places to Go for New Year 2024: Ride an Open-Top Bus for Good Luck! $98 Early Bird Discount Available
text:
Good places to go in the New Year 2024 | Take an open-top bus for good luck! Early bird discount starts from $98 per person on 12.29pm. Night tour of Tsim Sha Tsui waterfront and New Year lighting displays on both sides of Victoria Harbor
After bidding farewell to 2023, it will soon be time to bid farewell to the rabbit and welcome the dragon. I hope that the new year will be better than the old one. In addition to buying fortune books, you should also plan your New Year trip! The Tsim Sha Tsui waterfront lighting will be changed from Christmas style to a New Year theme full of New Year atmosphere. If you want to enjoy the meaningful lighting, but are afraid of crowds and walking to the point of weakness, it is recommended to participate in the “New Year Open Top Bus Universiade Lighting Parade”. KKday will launch an exclusive early bird discount at 3 pm on December 29. As long as you book the Universiade special open-top bus tour before January 4, 2024, it is only $98 per person. During the New Year’s Eve, third day and fourth day of the Lunar New Year, To participate, it’s only $138 per person. To have a good start in the Year of the Dragon, taking an open-top bus to bring good luck is definitely a good choice!
If you want to see the lanterns during the New Year to bring good luck to you, but you don’t want to be forced by others, especially if you are a family of both young and old, it is best to participate in the New Year open-top bus to celebrate the Universiade lighting parade.

Good luck in the Year of the Dragon!Take an open-top bus to admire the New Year lights on both sides of Victoria Harbor
After Christmas, the lights on both sides of the Victoria Harbor will be changed to a New Year theme, with festive red and purple colors, coupled with wishful and auspicious patterns, full of goodwill. The Tsim Sha Tsui waterfront and Nathan Road area are home to a concentration of lighting. If you want to enjoy the lighting during the festival to wish you good luck, it is best to join the New Year open-top bus for the Universiade Lighting Parade. Take a ride on an open-top bus and enjoy the lights on the upper floor of the bus without any blind spots. You are not afraid of being blocked by tall people or being crowded by people. You will definitely make money by being harmonious. The New Year Open-top Bus Universiade Lighting Parade departs from the main entrance of the Kowloon Hotel in Tsim Sha Tsui. The journey takes about 45 minutes and will tour the Tsim Sha Tsui waterfront and Nathan Road. Professional tour guides will explain the scenic spots throughout the journey. You can celebrate Universiade and gain knowledge at the same time!
Sitting on the top floor of the bus, you don’t have to worry about being blocked by the crowds of people.
Surrounded by overwhelming lighting, it feels like an expert is blessing you with luck in the Year of the Dragon.
Grab an early bird discount before January 4th starting at $98 per person
If you want to have more than enough every year, you have to be smart! The original price of the New Year open-top bus Universiade Lighting Parade is $250 per person. KKday has launched an exclusive early bird discount from 3PM on December 29 to January 4, 2023. Purchase the itinerary from February 6 to February 22, 2024. The price is as low as 40% off, only $98 per person. If you want to be lucky on New Year’s Eve, the third day of the Lunar New Year, or the fourth day of the Lunar New Year, KKday also offers a 55% off limited-time discount. You can celebrate the festival for only $138 per person, and get a good start to the Year of the Dragon!
Take an open-top bus to enjoy the Universiade with ease, and there are professional tour guides to explain, so you don’t have to worry about missing the best lighting.
